author: jorton
msg: success if a non-blocking read was requested; for a blocking read,

author: pkluegl
msg: added recursion plateau for greedy atomic rule elements. If there is only one possible path for further matching, then a loop is applied for the match caused by the quantifier. This fixes rules like ANY+ for large documents. Added test case LongGreedy that covers this functionality.
Inference for rules like (ANY ANY)+ is not yet adapted. They still can throw an StackOverflowError.
